# If there’s a selection, output that twice (as a snippet) # leaving the duplicate as the new selected text. # Otherwise split the current line around the caret and # output “right, left” to duplicate the line, leaving the # caret in the same place on the new line
if [[ -n "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" ]] then exit_insert_snippet '$TM_SELECTED_TEXT${0:$TM_SELECTED_TEXT}' else exit_insert_text "${TM_CURRENT_LINE:TM_LINE_INDEX} ${TM_CURRENT_LINE:0:TM_LINE_INDEX}" fi
